titleStmt.title: Memorables concerning our uprightness before God, and our resignation to his will. / Gathered out of Dr. B's judicious treatises thereof. Thus published for the poor, that want money and memory. By one desirous of poor folks salvation.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho: Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
